title: 1980–81 Primeira Divisão
text:
The 1980–81 <a href="Primeira%20Liga">Primeira Divisão</a> was the 47th season of <a href="Portuguese%20football%20league%20system">top-tier</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> in <a href="Portugal">Portugal</a>.
Overview.
It was contested by 16 teams, and <a href="S.L.%20Benfica">S.L. Benfica</a> won the championship.
League standings.
